about_the_game:
OhMyRace! is more than just a competitive platform game. It's a thrilling adventure designed for 1 to 6 players, offering an unforgettable gaming experience. Dive into a dynamic and enchanting world, where each level presents unique settings, ranging from enchanted forests to medieval Japan, and ancient temples hidden within lush jungles. These vibrant environments add an extra layer of excitement to each race, ensuring that every game is both fresh and captivating.


The true magic of OhMyRace! lies in the inclusion of special powers. Players are equipped with an array of quirky and game-changing abilities that can be used strategically to gain an edge over their competitors. Whether it's a rocket boost, a teleportation spell, or a temporary size-changing potion, these powers add an element of surprise and unpredictability to each race. It's not just about running; it's about mastering these powers and using them cleverly to outmaneuver your opponents.


The heart of OhMyRace! beats to the rhythm of competitiveness. Your ultimate goal is to cross the finish line first, and the competition is intense. It's not just a race; it's a full-throttle, no-holds-barred contest where anything goes. As you and your friends aim for the top spot, you'll unleash your powers, dodge obstacles, and leap through challenging terrain, all while battling to maintain your lead.

Train in solo or gather your crew, choose your favorite characters, and get ready for hours of laughter and excitement. OhMyRace! is more than just a game; it's a shared experience that will have you and your friends cheering, groaning, and celebrating together.


Prepare to immerse yourself in the wild and wonderful world of OhMyRace! - an extraordinary platforming experience that combines stunning visuals, unpredictable powers, and the thrill of fierce competition. Will you be the first to claim victory in this uproarious and action-packed game?
